value.stringValue: CTS NA North Central Parts Entitlement
CTS NA Product Support Milestone Updates

actionCalls.name: myRule_1_A1
actionCalls.label: Fire Flow to Set Entitlement on Case

value.stringValue: CTS NA Product Support Milestone Updates

rules.name: myRule_13
rules.label: Update Entitlement on New Na North Central Parts Case

rules.name: myRule_15
rules.label: Update Case Milestone of NA North Central Parts

Flow.description: Update case prior stage field with current status ,change status to onHold and update Case Milestone

value.stringValue: AND( ISCHANGED([Case].Status), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE([Case].Status),"New") , NOT( ISPICKVAL([Case].Status, "On Hold") ), NOT(ISNEW()), [Case].RecordType.DeveloperName = 'CTS_NA_North_Central_Parts' )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_15
formulas.expression: AND( ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Status}), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE({!myVariable_current.Status}),"New") , NOT( ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Status}, "On Hold") ), NOT(ISNEW()), {!myVariable_current.RecordType.DeveloperName} = 'CTS_NA_North_Central_Parts' )

value.stringValue:
AND(
OR( ISCHANGED([Case].Status), AND(ISCHANGED([Case].IsStopped ), [Case].IsStopped= true) ), NOT(ISNEW()), [Case].RecordType.DeveloperName = 'NA_Completes_Product_Support' )

Flow.label: CTS Update Case
